document_data.mainbody:
hondall Sszundar was a mage of Faer√ªn.
Circa 1357 DR, Khondall bought the Book of Bats from the merchant Chulu Thall of Ithmong, and was able to catalog the tomes spells. But he had it but briefly before an unknown enemy dispatched demons that demolished his tower, and the tome was lost. Shortly after, the Book of Bats resurfaced in Innarlith, then was swiftly stolen.The date of this is unknown, only being sometime between the Book of Batss appearance in c. 1147 DR and its last disappearance c. 1357 DR.
